snippet.title: Spear Song Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Ancient Slavic knights fight against evil in turn-based tactical combat! Lead a group of knights through the kingdom to cleanse the land from fiends and monsters! Each attempt to save the kingdom presents a new, randomly generated journey.

Add to Steam wishlist: https://shorturl.at/pwBN7
